data.message: What a shame...and even more of a shame is that facebook would brag about this as though it was a good thing...I'm disappointed.

replies.message: The Bible is not a law book.
It's not a good thing. .it's a GREAT thing

Society in general is trying to de-sensitize the public to the idea. Have you noticed how much gay & lesbian ideals have been showing up on TV, in movies, and social media over the past few years? This post really doesn't surprise me. Not that it makes it any less disappointing.

Samuel D Telefonia O FACEBOOK SÓ SABE PBLOQUEAR AS PESSOAS DE BEM E AS DE MA INDOLE FICAM FAZENDO FALCATRUAS, E O PESSOA DO FACE NEM TE RESPONDE E NEM DÃO SATISFAÇAO PRA VC. SO MANDA VC ENTRAR NAS QUELAS PAGINAS ONDE TUODO MUNDO RECLMA A MESMA COISA E PERGUNTA A MESMO COISA. FUI BLOQUEAADO POR QUE....vc não ajudam em nada, so sabem bloquear as pessoas
